intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product. It provides a comprehensive overview of the N2K product, a detailed land cover/land use (LC/LU) dataset specifically tailored for monitoring grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe. The manual details the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment procedures, and technical specifications, enabling users to effectively utilise the N2K data for environmental assessment and reporting purposes. The document focuses on the technical aspects of the product, including its classification system, spatial resolution, and data formats, as well as providing guidance on accessing and using the data.
